about.title: About Me
about.p1: I am a 3rd-year Computer Engineering student at Istanbul Rumeli University. My academic focus areas include frontend development, user interface design, and web technologies.
about.p2: I embrace clean code principles and user-centered design approaches in software development processes. In team collaborations, I prioritize effective communication and a strong sense of responsibility.
